name: ollat

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ OL, c0 ∈ Lat, c0 ∈ OP)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, clat))
-| wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ OL → c0 ∈ Lat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ OL ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c0 ∈ OP))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, clat))
-| wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ OL → c0 ∈ Lat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ OL ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c0 ∈ OP))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))

comment: An ortholattice is a lattice. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
